name: The Gallerist
description:
Navigate the crowded gallery as you rush to sell your paintings for the best price.

Each game, paintings and buyers are randomly generated, giving buyers unique tastes and personalities! Buyers will frantically search the gallery for the perfect painting. 

Let time pass. if more than one buyer is interested in a painting, the highest bidder will win and you can double what the painting was appraised for.

Sell as many paintings as you can in one minute, don't get lost!
